Put your quotation template background images here (high resolution, A4 portrait).

Required filenames (recommended PNG):
- page1.png  (the first page template with logo/colors/left-side company details)
- page2.png  (the second page template (terms & conditions page))

These files will be used by the PDF generator at runtime:
- /quotation-template/page1.png
- /quotation-template/page2.png

After adding them, redeploy and the generated PDF will match your template.
